title: Audio on voice calls drops sometimes when on WiFi (Google Pixel 5)
content:
Sometimes when I'm on a call and connected to WiFi, audio stops working on my side of the connection.
1. When on WiFI, even though it doesn't seem like the WiFi connection is dead, I will not be able to hear the other person when I'm on a call.
2. The other person can still hear me. 
3. When I disconnect from WiFi, audio goes back to normal. I can hear the other party and they continue to hear me. 
4. I'm running Android 11. March 5, 2021 Security Update. Feb 1, 2021 Google Play system update. Build RQ2A.210305.006
